Battera::

She lay covered under the debree.  She felt the pain in her body, 
then, with a flash of thought, she felt her systems shut down. Her 
signal was now off and her optics dark. Her internal clock started 
it's countdown.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        "What the blazes...?"  He shakes his head again.  "I missed 
on 
> purpose, and what does she do, fly into the shots.  By the pit she 
is an odd one, oh 
> well.  So it goes."  He looks around and realizes he's lost track 
of 
> Blackstorm in the commotion.  He sends a brief message to 
her.  "Hello Blackstorm, 
> could you do me a favor and send me your coordinates, I have a 
brief message to 
> relay to you that is best delivered in person."
